body:
Hey,


Do we know who is presenting? I am probably not going to be able to stay
the second day of the conference (I'll be there the 12th and 13th), so
could you schedule me for the 13th to present?


Alstan told me that he received a free admission to the last Radiance
conference when he gave a pre-workshop session. Since the workshop is free
this year, will the 4/5 of us presenting on the 12th get any compensation,
like the dinner?


Thanks,
Kera




On Wed, Jul 24, 2013 at 5:29 PM, Guglielmetti, Robert <
